name: La Estrella - Polar - Rothschild
additionalNotes:
From the makers of the world-famous Macanudo and Cohiba brands comes La Estrella Cubana - a silky Nicaraguan smoke at a stunning low price. La Estrella Cubana Connecticut showcases a blend of aged Nicaraguan binder and filler leaves nestled inside a golden brown Honduran wrapper to bring you a brilliant 
La Estrella Cubana Habano showcases a blend of aged Nicaraguan binder and filler leaves nestled inside a handsome and hearty Habano wrapper leaf to deliver a brilliant medium to full-bodied smoke with smooth and zesty notes of roasted nuts, coffee, spice, and hints of caramel sweetness.Â
